channel.title: Uh....making npc's say diffrent things?
channel.description: okay..just got new compiler pretty sure it works..it said complete. I go to the things in npchandler...and i change the text. then i click save. then i compile. then i restart server...and still nothing happens. someone please help me, i appreciate all of the help that i can possible get from this post. thankyou, twinke42.

item.title: Uh....making npc's say diffrent things?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

Be sure, you already closed your server, save it, compile, run.

And look if you changed the good npc:p

item.title: Uh....making npc's say diffrent things?
item.dc:creator: @LOLMFAO LOLMFAO
item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

you edit NPChandler.java, save, and compile and nothing works wow i would just try to use a different compiler just in case yours doesnt work for some odd reason
